name: Santa Christmas Bubble Shooter
description:
Spend your holiday playing this awesome bubble shooter puzzle game and enjoy hundreds of joyful levels wrapped with amazing boosts and power-ups.
Join Santa on his magical journey and explore his thrilling puzzle levels.
Santa is waiting for you to shoot all the bubbles and collect christmas candies and presents captured inside the breakable bubbles for you to free and collect them. best thing for you is, this new bubble shooter game is totally free on this Christmas Eve.

HOW TO PLAY: "Santa Christmas Bubble Shooter"

> Tap, adjust angle and swipe to shoot bubbles from cannon.
> Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles that have same colours to burst and release the candies inside them.
> Help Santa Clause to save candies from the flying bubbles.

POWER UPS:

* FIRE BALL -> Use fire ball to break a big chunk of bubbles.
* MAGIC BALL -> Destroy bubble of any colour with magic ball.
* SUN BALL -> Use it destroy a complete vertical or diagonal column of bubbles.

FEATURES :
- Beautiful art style designed for any age.
- Rain/snow effect.
- Designed for Marry Christmas spirit.
- Three Power Ups to fill up.
- FREE to play
- Less intrusive Advertisement.
- Ads can be fully removed in a very cheap price.

Last but not least we always welcome and consider your faithful reviews.
Enjoy and have fun !
